00016 template <class Ui, class Shape, class ShapeModel>
00017 class TShapeParamsGuiCompBase:
00018                      public iqt2d::TViewExtenderCompBase<
00019                                           iqtgui::TDesignerGuiObserverCompBase<Ui, ShapeModel> >
00020 {
00021 public:
00022        typedef iqt2d::TViewExtenderCompBase<iqtgui::TDesignerGuiObserverCompBase<Ui, ShapeModel> > BaseClass;
00023 
00024        I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(TShapeParamsGuiCompBase);
00025               I_ASSIGN(m_unitNameAttrPtr, "UnitName", "Name of geometric units e.g. mm", false, "mm");
00026               I_ASSIGN(m_colorSchemaCompPtr, "ShapeColorShema", "Color shema used by displayed shape", false, "ShapeColorShema");
00027        I_END_COMPONENT;
00028 
00029        // reimplemented (imod::IObserver)
00030        virtual bool OnAttached(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00031        virtual bool OnDetached(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00032 
00033 protected:
00034        typedef typename BaseClass::Shapes Shapes;
00035        typedef typename BaseClass::ShapesMap ShapesMap;
00036 
00037        virtual Shape* CreateShape() const;
00038 
00039        // reimplemented (iqt2d::TViewExtenderCompBase)
00040        virtual void CreateShapes(int sceneId, Shapes& result);
00041 
00042        I_ATTR(QString, m_unitNameAttrPtr);
00043        I_REF(iview::IColorShema, m_colorSchemaCompPtr);
00044 };

00050 
00051 template <class Ui, class Shape, class ShapeModel>
00052 bool TShapeParamsGuiCompBase<Ui, Shape, ShapeModel>::OnAttached(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00053 {
00054        if (BaseClass::OnAttached(modelPtr)){
00055               const ShapesMap& shapesMap = BaseClass::GetShapesMap();
00056               for (         typename ShapesMap::const_iterator iter = shapesMap.begin();
00057                                    iter != shapesMap.end();
00058                                    ++iter){
00059                      const Shapes& shapes = iter.value();
00060                      int shapesCount = shapes.GetCount();
00061                      for (int shapeIndex = 0; shapeIndex < shapesCount; ++shapeIndex){
00062                             Shape* shapePtr = dynamic_cast<Shape*>(shapes.GetAt(shapeIndex));
00063                             if (shapePtr != NULL){
00064                                    if (modelPtr->AttachObserver(shapePtr)){
00065                                           shapePtr->SetVisible(true);
00066                                    }
00067                             }
00068                      }
00069               }
00070 
00071               return true;
00072        }
00073        else{
00074               return false;
00075        }
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 template <class Ui, class Shape, class ShapeModel>
00080 bool TShapeParamsGuiCompBase<Ui, Shape, ShapeModel>::OnDetached(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00081 {
00082        if (BaseClass::OnDetached(modelPtr)){
00083               const ShapesMap& shapesMap = BaseClass::GetShapesMap();
00084               for (         typename ShapesMap::const_iterator iter = shapesMap.begin();
00085                                    iter != shapesMap.end();
00086                                    ++iter){
00087                      const Shapes& shapes = iter.value();
00088                      int shapesCount = shapes.GetCount();
00089                      for (int shapeIndex = 0; shapeIndex < shapesCount; ++shapeIndex){
00090                             Shape* shapePtr = dynamic_cast<Shape*>(shapes.GetAt(shapeIndex));
00091                             if (shapePtr != NULL){
00092                                    modelPtr->DetachObserver(shapePtr);
00093 
00094                                    shapePtr->SetVisible(false);
00095                             }
00096                      }
00097               }
00098 
00099               return true;
00100        }
00101        else{
00102               return false;
00103        }
00104 }

00109 template <class Ui, class Shape, class ShapeModel>
00110 Shape* TShapeParamsGuiCompBase<Ui, Shape, ShapeModel>::CreateShape() const
00111 {
00112        return new Shape();

00116 // reimplemented (iqt2d::TViewExtenderCompBase)
00117 
00118 template <class Ui, class Shape, class ShapeModel>
00119 void TShapeParamsGuiCompBase<Ui, Shape, ShapeModel>::CreateShapes(int /*sceneId*/, Shapes& result)
00120 {
00121        Shape* shapePtr = CreateShape();
00122        if (shapePtr != NULL){
00123               if (m_colorSchemaCompPtr.IsValid()){
00124                      shapePtr->SetUserColorShema(m_colorSchemaCompPtr.GetPtr());
00125               }
00126 
00127               result.PushBack(shapePtr);
00128 
00129               imod::IModel* modelPtr = BaseClass::GetModelPtr();
00130               if (modelPtr != NULL){
00131                      if (modelPtr->AttachObserver(shapePtr)){
00132                             shapePtr->SetVisible(true);
00133                      }
00134               }
00135        }
00136 }
